Banner.Description: I have 2+ years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular JS, NodeJS and sometimes in Python applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 2+ years as a developer, I sought to train every day. I have worked on Micro Frontend Technologies, Angular Custom Libraries, writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covered backend developer roles with ExpressJS, NestJs, MongoDB and MySQL. I have led teams having empathy, motivating to partners, and collaboratively setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Engineer
Description: Developed and maintained a web-based application using Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Designed and implemented multiple Plugin's to support multiple applications, using Angular Libraries.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Worked in team of 4 people in the development of a E-Retail Cloud based solution, Flyaway Hub.
Used Git, AWS Codecommit for Version Controlling.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular developer
Description: Developed and maintained web applications using Angular.
Coding of API requests with RxJS using HTTP modules.
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms
Improved website performance by optimizing images and implementing caching techniques.
Collaborated with designers and back-end developers to create responsive and user-friendly web experiences
Lead a team of 4 Angular Interns, providing them with training and support.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend and backend.
Creating platforms with Angular, Nodejs,reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Automation of processes with data structures.
Design layout with SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize, Prime Faces, etc.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: E-Retail Point
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A Next Generation Cloud based E-Retail System application made from scratch with Micro Frontend Technologie's, role based setting's and user management.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Flyaway Hub
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Flyaway Hub is a cloud-based management information system (MIS). Flexibly designed according to the demanding needs of the Aviation Industry . Letting you easily manage your resources and schedule in a secure environment.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: IntelligentForms
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: IntelligentForms is for the Dental Practices accross UK that are future-oriented, brand conscious, customer-focused, providing effective clinical processes, and aligned with staff’s happiness, IntelligentForms Pro is the best solution.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Three Oaks Behavioral Health & Wellness
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Three Oaks is a team of deeply passionate, highly skilled, and intensively trained providers that believe therapy is a process of growth & self-discovery, thus making the experience uniquely yours.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Covid Tracker
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Covid Tracker is a web app which is built using the 3rd Party Api integration. This app shows the records from worldwise and countrywise that shows the who much patient are suffer from covid who many died from covid and how many are recoverd from covid

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Quiz App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page quiz app that has a minimal design, that has different level to attempt quizes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: JWT Integration
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: JWT authentication in Node Js with MsSQL

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
